docs.title: Welcome to SniderCode
docs.text:
I'm a 43-year-old electronics engineer learning to code 1–2 hours every day.

This site documents everything I learn — the wins, the bugs, and the projects.

Currently learning: Python → Django → Full-stack

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Hi, I'm Jay Snider (@Pycelium on GitHub) — a 43-year-old electronics engineer who decided to become a full-stack developer.

I study 1–2 hours every single day, no excuses. This site is my public log of everything I learn: the wins, the bugs, the “why did that take 4 hours” moments, and every project I ship.

Background - Degree in Electronics Engineering - 20+ years tinkering with hardware - Now obsessed with Python, Django, and building things people actually use

Goal Go from zero to paid freelance / remote dev job in 2026.

Stick around — let’s build this together.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: Coming soon — my first finished apps will appear here with live demos and source code.
